Package library

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Book
    Represents a book with its title, creator, publisher, year, identifier, and format.
    Customer
    Represents a customer of a library system.
    Librarian
    Represents a librarian who manages customers and loans in a library.
    LibraryApplication
    Main application class for the library management system.
    Loan
    Represents a loan of a book, with details about the loan and return dates, and the status of the loan.
    Main
    The main class for the library application.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Universe
    Represents different universes or categories for library items.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    BookNotInDataBaseException
    An exception thrown when a book is not found in the BNF (Bibliothèque nationale de France) database.
    EmptyResearchException
    An exception thrown when no book matches the specified filters in the BNF (Bibliothèque nationale de France) database.
    LoanNotFoundException
    Custom exception to be thrown when a loan is not found.
    MissingDataFileException
    Custom exception to be thrown when the data file containing loans and user data is missing.
